First
 <math alttext="786" overflow="scroll"><mn>786</mn></math>

Based on the successive ionization energies of element <math alttext="X" overflow="scroll"> <mtext>X</mtext> </math> shown in the table above, which of the following is most likely the formula of the compound produced when element <math alttext="X" overflow="scroll"><mtext>X</mtext></math> reacts with fluorine?

skill.text: 4.A: Predict and/or explain chemical properties or phenomena (e.g., of atoms or molecules) using given chemical theories, models, and representations.
